title: New: PLOY – X I X
body:
So it’s a sound we’ve heard before, there’s no denying that, but I’m a sucker for a bit of 80’s inspired synth-pop, especially when it’s this delicious.

 Hyattsville’s **PLOY**, a duo comprised of Gil Wojcik and Justin Victoria, are a dead-cert to make a vast number of ‘Summer 2013 Playlists’, at least in the blog world. New track _X I X_ (Nineteen) is a nostalgic gem, complete with wishy-washy vocals and a disco-infused chorus. Check it out below.
